question:
You have been living in a rental apartment for the past year. Recently a new neighbour moved in and has been making a lot of noise, which disturbs you. Write a letter to the landlord. In your letter: *Explain the situation *Describe why it bothers you
 *Suggest a solution
text: I hope this letter finds you in pink health. I am writing to you to express my concern related to my neighbour, Raman, who is recently moved to our locality and resides next to my house.

I am pursuing my master's degree from Delhi University and my exams are coming in the next month, due to which I had to devote many hours to my studies. However, I could not focus on my studies properly due to Mr Raman who used to play loud music throughout the whole day and the night.

Even I am unable to sleep because of the noise which is coming from his home and it causes a lot of inconvenience to me as well as my family members as they also cannot perform their regular tasks due to this. Furthermore, It distract me a lot that unfortunately I got very low scores in my previous semester.

Although I tried to communicate with him yet I got no positive response from his side. Therefore, It would be really appreciable If you could please ask him about the matter and also elaborate to him, all the circumstances faced by me. It would really helpful for me.
I hope you will pay attention to the above-mentioned matter.
